title: Getting RADS Error. (I know how annoying it is to see this, I've tried every solution I can find)
body:
So I've been away from lol for a while now but for the last week I've been getting the itch to play again but I'm constantly getting hit with the rads error, I've tried the following and none have worked;
Reinstalling
Pinging leagueoflegends.com (all packets lost)
Launching lol.launcher.admin, lol.launcher and rads_user_kernel.exe
Google DSN (w/ validate)
DSN flush
Disabling all firewalls
Putting lol on the list of allowed apps
Restarting

None of these have worked. Have I missed anything?
Thanks.
Freddie.

replies.body: This error is usually caused by security or permissions settings that prevents the game from launching.  I appreciate the troubleshooting done so far, but a lot of those are for connection problems.  Instead, I suggest using each step in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
